reviews.review_msg: Matt pushes his students to be better in their writing, does not direct us to take another path but helps us dig deeper into our own understanding of the topics. Weekly readings are expected and there is an online discussion forum every other week. Overall, he's great, really fun, interesting, likes to make jokes. Just don't sleep/use phone.
This class is very boring, I regret that I have not chosen another professor. If you like to discuss 2 hrs each week, then go and take his class and good luck with your final exam.

I cannot believe he has that much good comment! I have to say he is tough and I feel I didn't learn anything through this whole semester. Also, he likes to put sensitive political cases in class which make me so uncomfortable. For the essays, you need to write what he thinks, if what you write is different with his expectation, you get a low mark.
